name: Desolate - Heroic Death EP
description: Hamburg based Fauxpas Musik imprint is born to deliver vinyl only high quality music as limited editions. Our idea is to share the music we love with our same-minded fellows. As vinyl is the only medium for real listening pleasure both in clubs and at home, you won’t find our releases in any other format than vinyl. We are very proud to present our first release with desolate’s heroic death ep. desolate’s visonary idea of sound has a tremendous breadth and adroit touch for a producer of his experience, incorporating elements of modern classical with minimized dub, deep house and Detroit techno. His outstanding previous releases under other monkiers are set to be future classics. Vinyl tastes better. A1 Endurance, A2 Designate, B1 Heroic Death

name: Mittekill - Zum Spielplatz EP (Goldwill Remixe)
description: COMES AGAIN AS A LIMITED EDITION IN COLOURED, HANDNUMBRED VINYL! Hamburg based fauxpas musik imprint is born to deliver vinyl only high quality music as limited editions. Our idea is to share the music we love with our same-minded fellows. After the success of Desolate’s Heroic Death EP, we are very proud to present fauxpas002. After listening to the original verion of ZUM SPIELPLATZ by MITTEKILL on byte.fm radio, we asked Modul8 to license the track for our new label about a year ago. Fortunatelly they were happy about our idea to get it remixed by GOLDWILL, too. GOLDWILL delivered two remixes that just blew us away and that’s why we decided to put both on this 3 track EP you’re holding in your hands right now. Enjoy ! Vinyl Tastes better… Tracklist: A1 Zum Spielplatz (Original) A2 Zum Spielplatz (Goldwill Childhood Remix), B1 Zum Spielplatz (Goldwill Playground Dub)

name: Nick Solé - Beautiful Day EP
description: The third and final part of our coloured vinyl trilogy comes again as a limited edition and handnumbred. This time NICK SOLÉ (Mojuba) drops three classic US deep house flavoured tunes. On the A side the musical journey is called “Earth” - steadily flowing and evolving and sometimes even getting lost in it’s melodies and harmonies while it keeps pushing forward with it’s hint of dub technoish spices. On the flip we have “Beautiful Day” which seems to be the perfect soundtrack for a long long sunny summer day or morning. Imagine the sun rising above some trees on the horizon and this track played out loud after a long dark night. Finally we have “You Are My Life” as a bonus track to finish of our trilogy! It’s dedicated to bring some colour, joy and friendliness into your life or set! This time the artwork has been done by cialex, who is the man behind the flyers of famous “Golden Pudel Club” in Hamburg and the Groove Release Parties in Horst Krzbrg! Tracklisting: a- earth b1 beautiful day (atmos deep mix) b2 you are my life

name: Sevensol & Bender - Scuba
description: Our Friends from Leipzig Alex and Dennis aka Sevensol & Bender (Kann Records) sent us some tracks for listening when Fauxpas Musik wasn’t even founded. Scuba was one of those and didn’t disappear from our mind since then. Klick, Klack, Bumm Tschack… now we’ve got some remixes from Oskar Offermann (White) and Aera (Aleph Music, Goldwill) taking the track further and a perfect EP is done! This Vinyl comes in Hard Plastic Sleeve and is Limited to 400 Copies worldwide. Try it, love it, or not - we do! Vinyl tastes better…

name: Rising Sun - Lift Up Your Faces EP
description:
Artist: Rising Sun  
Titel: Lift Up Your Faces EP
Tracklist: A1 - Lift Up Your Faces, A2 Lonely Clarinet, B1 Lift Up Your Faces (Julius Steinhoff Remix), B2 The Sun Orchestra

This limited beautiful piece of yellow coloured vinyl comes with an extra large poster done by paedie.de
